pr_title: chore(engine): adjust initilizeTelemetry config to null by default

timeline.message:
chore(engine): adjust initilizeTelemetry config to null by default

* enabling to fetch null wheather the telemetry is already configured or
not
* extend tests

Related to CAM-12377

chore(engine): adjust initilizeTelemetry config to null by default

* enabling to fetch null wheather the telemetry is already configured or
not
* extend tests
* fix setup in concurrent telemetry test

timeline.bodyText: Suggested change * treated as false and no data is send, * treated as false and no data is sent,
timeline.author: koevskinikola
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1352,7 +1352,15 @@ Batch setJobRetriesAsync (List processInstanceIds, void toggleTelemetry(boolean enabled); /** - * Checks if sending telemetry data to Camunda is enabled/disabled + * Checks how sending telemetry data to Camunda is configured + * @return + *
    + *
  • null if the configuration is not defined so far, + * treated as false and no data is send,

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/engine/src/main/java/org/camunda/bpm/engine/ManagementService.java b/engine/src/main/java/org/camunda/bpm/engine/ManagementService.java index 849df21195..94566b0902 100644 --- a/engine/src/main/java/org/camunda/bpm/engine/ManagementService.java +++ b/engine/src/main/java/org/camunda/bpm/engine/ManagementService.java @@ -1356,7 +1356,7 @@ public interface ManagementService { * @return *
    *
  • null if the configuration is not defined so far, - * treated as false and no data is send,
    • + * treated as false and no data is sent, *
  • true if the telemetry sending is enabled, and
    • *
  • false if the telemetry is disabled explicitly.
    • *

timeline.message:
fix(javadoc): fix typo in telemetry javadoc
